beverages.name: Won Ton Soup with Chicken
beverages.description: chicken-stuffed won tons in clear chicken broth with white meat chicken pieces and a few scallions

beverages.name: Chicken Corn Soup
beverages.description: clear chicken broth with creamy corn and egg drop with white meat chicken pieces

beverages.name: Hot and Sour Soup
beverages.description: tofu, chicken, mushroom, bamboo shoot, and egg

beverages.name: Egg Drop with Won Ton Soup
beverages.description: chicken soup with egg drop and won tons

beverages.name: Chicken Noodle Soup
beverages.description: clear broth and lo mein noodles or white rice, chicken pieces

beverages.name: Garden Vegetable Soup
beverages.description: clear chicken broth with mixed vegetables (carrots, cabbage, baby corn, mushroom, snow peas)

beverages.name: Garden Vegetable Soup with Tofu
beverages.description: clear chicken broth with mixed vegetables (carrots, cabbage, baby corn, mushroom, snow peas) with tofu pieces

beverages.name: Chicken with Garden Vegetable Soup
beverages.description: clear chicken broth with mixed vegetables (carrots, cabbage, baby corn, mushroom, snow peas) and chicken pieces

beverages.name: Hong Kong Style Won Ton Soup
beverages.description: clear chicken broth with carrots, mushrooms, snow peas, and broccoli, and a few pieces of Hong Kong style won tons

snacks.description: eggroll with cabbage, carrots and beef

snacks.description: cabbage and carrots in eggroll wrappers

snacks.description: triangle shaped won ton with ground white meat chicken inside

snacks.name: Chicken Toast
snacks.description: ground chicken meat on bread, deep-fried, comes with 4 pieces

snacks.name: Fried Silky Tofu with Special Garlic Sauce
snacks.description: 4 large tofu cubes, breaded and deep-fried, with garlic sauce on the side

snacks.name: Scallion Pancake
snacks.description: dough mixed with scallion and pan-fried

snacks.name: Steamed Vegetable Dumplings
snacks.description: house-made dough dumpling with carrot, mushroom, cellophane noodles, cabbage (6 pieces)

desserts.name: Szechuan Soft Won Ton
desserts.description: soft won tons filled with chicken, with garlic sauce

desserts.name: Chicken in Soothing Lettuce Wraps
desserts.description: white-meat chicken with mushrooms, green peppers, water chestnuts, carrots sauteed with special house sauce, wrapped in fresh lettuce

desserts.name: Teriyaki Beef
desserts.description: 6 pieces of beef on skewers with teriyaki sauce

desserts.name: Cold Sesame Noodle
desserts.description: Peanut butter sauce and sesame seeds on lo mein noodles

desserts.name: Chinese Scallion Pancake Wrap

desserts.name: Teriyaki Chicken
